com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api

Class SearchServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.SearchServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompletableSearchServer, OtherTestSearchServer, ReportingSearchServer, SolrSearchServer

    public abstract class SearchServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    Abstract class which offers a common set of methods to be implemented by the specific server implementations (Solr, ElasticSearch,..).
    Since:
    15.06.16.

                                       java.lang.String collection)
        Gets a SearchServer implementation object defined in the classpath from the ServiceLoader.
        Parameters:
        host - server which the instance should connect to.
        collection - Name of the core/collection to be used by the instance.
        Returns:
        SearchServer specific implementation.

      • indexBean

        public void indexBean(java.lang.Object... t)

      • indexBean

        public void indexBean(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> t)

      • delete

        @Deprecated
public final void delete(java.lang.Object t)
        Deprecated. use deleteBean(Object) instead
        Remove an Object t from the search server index. The object should be annotated at list with Id.commit() should be executed afterwards for this change to take place on the index.
        Parameters:
        t - Object to be removed from the index.
        Throws:
        SearchServerException - if not possible to perform the deletion.

      • deleteBean

        public void deleteBean(java.lang.Object t)
        Remove an Object t from the search server index. The object should be annotated at list with Id.commit() should be executed afterwards for this change to take place on the index.
        Parameters:
        t - Object to be removed from the index.
        Throws:
        SearchServerException - if not possible to perform the deletion.

      • getBackend

        public abstract java.lang.Object getBackend()
        Gets the specific server client of the server implementation.
        Returns:
        The specific server client.

      • index

        public abstract void index(Document... doc)
        Adds a Document or Documents to the search server index. commit() should be executed afterwards for this change to take place on the index.
        Parameters:
        doc - comma separated Documents to be indexed.

      • index

        public abstract void index(java.util.List<Document> doc)
        Adds a Document or Documents to the search server index. commit() should be executed afterwards for this change to take place on the index.
        Parameters:
        doc - comma separated Documents to be indexed.

      • delete

        public abstract void delete(Document doc)
        Removes a Document from the search server index. commit() should be executed afterwards for this change to take place on the index.
        Parameters:
        doc - Document to be indexed.
        Throws:
        SearchServerException - if not possible to perform the deletion.

      • execute

        public abstract void execute(Update update,
                             DocumentFactory factory)
        Changes a document in the index, based on the modifications described by Update.
        Parameters:
        update - Update modification to do on an specific document in the index.
        factory - DocumentFactory factory with the document schema.
        Throws:
        SearchServerException - if not possible to execute the update.

      • execute

        public abstract void execute(Delete delete,
                             DocumentFactory factory)
        Deletes Documents which match the Delete filter configuration.
        Parameters:
        delete - A Delete filter configured.
        factory - The type of Document to be deleted.

      • commit

        public void commit()
        Pushes to the index the modifications.
        Throws:
        SearchServerException - if not possible to commit.

      • commit

        public abstract void commit(boolean optimize)
        Pushes to the index the modifications and optionally optimizes.
        Parameters:
        optimize - boolean flag to indicate whether the core should be optimize after commit or not.
        Throws:
        SearchServerException - if not possible to commit.

      • execute

        public abstract <T> BeanSearchResult<T> execute(FulltextSearch search,
                                                java.lang.Class<T> c)
        Executes a FulltextSearch based on an annotated class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - annotated class type.
        Parameters:
        search - FulltextSearch search query configuration object.
        c - annotated class mapping the index documents and the result type.
        Returns:
        BeanSearchResult storing the search results with type T
        Throws:
        SearchServerException - if not possible to execute the full text search.

      • execute

        public abstract SearchResult execute(FulltextSearch search,
                                     DocumentFactory factory)
        Executes a fulltext search based on an DocumentFactory.
        Parameters:
        search - FulltextSearch search query configuration object.
        factory - DocumentFactory mapping the index documents and the result type.
        Returns:
        SearchResult storing the search results with type T
        Throws:
        SearchServerException - if not possible to execute the full text search.

      • execute

        public abstract <T> SuggestionResult execute(ExecutableSuggestionSearch search,
                                             java.lang.Class<T> c)
        Executes a suggestion search based on an annotated class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Class type.
        Parameters:
        search - ExecutableSuggestionSearch object with the query configuration.
        c - Annotated class type to be used as mapping.
        Returns:
        SuggestionResult object storing the server results.
        Throws:
        SearchServerException - if not possible to execute the suggestion search.

        Parameters:
